site.name: Machu Picchu Availability
home.hero.title: MACHU PICCHU
home.section.availability.title: SELECT THE AVAILABILITY OF A DESTINATION
home.intro.title: Real-time tickets, permits, and availability for Machu Picchu
home.intro.p1: Check live availability for Machu Picchu, the Inca Trail, Salkantay, and nearby routes. Plan ahead, compare dates, and secure your entry before it sells out.
home.intro.strong: Check availability and book with confidence.
home.intro.subtitle: Official circuits and routes to visit Machu Picchu
home.intro.p2: Review circuits, schedules, and route options to choose the best experience for your trip.
home.circuits.title: Circuits and routes in Machu Picchu
home.circuits.p1: Machu Picchu offers multiple circuits that group several routes to explore the sanctuary. These routes allow different perspectives of the archaeological site, with additional options during high season.
home.circuits.subtitle: Available circuits and routes
home.circuits.c1.title: Circuit 1: Panoramic
home.circuits.c2.title: Circuit 2: Classic Machu Picchu
home.circuits.c3.title: Circuit 3: Machu Picchu Royalty
home.booking.title: Book your Machu Picchu circuit online
home.booking.p1: Don't miss the chance to explore Machu Picchu in a unique way. Book now and secure your spot for an unforgettable experience.
home.plan.title: Discover Machu Picchu and plan your visit in advance
home.plan.p1: Walk through Andean landscapes, discover the history of the ancient Inca city, and enjoy a unique place with centuries of culture. Learn what makes this visit special and why so many travelers choose it on their trip to Peru.
home.plan.p2: Before buying your tickets, check availability: spaces are limited and sell out fast, especially in high season. If you've decided to visit Machu Picchu, the Inca Trail, Salkantay, Qoriwayrachina, or Chachabamba, we recommend booking in advance to secure access and avoid surprises.
